metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5665 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: The splt_cue_export_to_file function in cue.c in libmp3splt 0.9.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and crash) via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: mp3splt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
